content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lantern
inventory=[{"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "yellow_dye", "quantity": 30, "index": 12}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "polished_andesite_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 36}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 64, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a lantern, I need to craft 9 iron nuggets and a torch. I can craft iron nuggets using the iron swords in my inventory. I will first move the coal from slot 16 to slot 1, as it is required for crafting the torch.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
